post.author: eviltwigflipper
post.body: Is there any chance raven will release the return to castle wolfenstein source code as gpl?

post.author: Kamikazee
post.body: Highly unlikely. id released the Q3 engine on which RtCW is based, so most thing which make up id Tech 3 is already released under the GPL. All the extra features are sure nice, but those are probably proprietary.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: id still sells the Q3A engine for $10k (non-GPL) and it includes all the RTCW code. That's the big reason to buy it vs GPL (you don't need to write AI stuff).

post.author: asmodeus
post.body: I've always been impressed by the number of companies that license the engine and then don't remove the cvars they aren't using (r_railcorewidth is a great example).
